title: Kamila Valieva’s Doctor Has Long Worked in the Shadows of Sport
description: Dr. Filipp Shvetsky was listed as Valieva’s supervising physician at the Beijing Games, where it was revealed she had tested positive for a banned drug before the event. He says he didn’t administer it.
dc:creator: Juliet Macur and Gabrielle Paluch
media:credit: Chang W. Lee/The New York Times
media:description: Kamila Valieva of Russia after the women’s free skate at the Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics.
